pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Entrez' in R // Provides an R interface to the NCBI's 'EUtils' API, allowing users to search databases like 'GenBank' https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genbank/ and 'PubMed' https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/, process the results of those searches and pull data into their R sessions.
